welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey

step1.title: Discover Your Path
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences.
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals

step2.title: Four Core Domains
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly.

step3.title: Start Your Journey
step3.description: Begin with an assessment and unlock your potential
step3.content: Ready to discover your AI literacy level and get personalized learning recommendations?
step3.benefit1: Detailed assessment of your AI knowledge

goals.title: What would you like to achieve?
goals.subtitle: Select your learning goals to get personalized recommendations

understand.title: Understand AI Fundamentals
understand.description: Learn the basics of AI, machine learning, and how AI systems work

create.title: Create Content with AI
create.description: Use AI tools for writing, design, art, and creative projects

analyze.title: Analyze Data with AI
analyze.description: Apply AI for data analysis, insights, and decision-making

build.title: Build AI Solutions
build.description: Develop and implement AI systems and applications

teach.title: Teach AI to Others
teach.description: Educate and guide others in understanding and using AI

ethical.title: Ensure Ethical AI Use
ethical.description: Understand and implement responsible AI practices

goals.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one learning goal
goals.helpText: Don't worry, you can always change these later in your profile settings.
